FuncDef: The display stp region-configuration command displays an MST region's valid configuration, including the region name, revision level, mappings between VLANs and spanning tree instances, and configuration digest. The display stp region-configuration command displays an MST region's valid configuration, including the region name, revision level, mappings between VLANs and spanning tree instances, and configuration digest.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays digest of a valid MST region configuration.
-

ExtraInfo: After an MST region is configured and takes effect on the MSTP network, run the display stp region-configuration command to view the MST region name, revision level, mapping between STP MSTIs and VLANs.
